title: Death's Door Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.20.21
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta talk about the stellar Death's Door reviews, the PS5 losing weight, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:15 - Housekeeping
I apologize to a developer on today’s PSILY!
Loki enters the MCU In Review lineup today!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:54 - Death’s Door Review Round-up
00:18:03 - Will this decision by Devolver, to put a title on Xbox exclusively but not on Game Pass, hurt its sales? - Best Friends Q:Marc Starvaggi
00:25:08 - Ubi’s New Tom Clancy Shooter: XDefiant, Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:33:02 -  Ad
00:36:19 - PS5 is Losing Weight! ERNEST LIN @ PSU
00:40:48 - Cris Tales Review Round-Up
00:43:25 - Tencent Buys Sumo, Christopher Dring @ GIB
00:46:58 - DEM TIMBITS
00:53:00 - Out today
00:57:00 -REQUIRED READING:
First It Was An Assassin's Creed Expansion, Now It's Ubisoft's 8 Year Nightmare - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
https://kotaku.com/first-it-was-an-assassins-creed-expansion-now-its-ubis-1847326742
00:59:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
